title: Basic Problem Solving with Arrays
subject: Data Structures
theory:
Standard patterns for interview problems.
- **Two Pointers**: One at start, one at end (e.g., Reverse array, Pair sum).
- **Sliding Window**: Subarray sum problems.

examples.code:
Reverse Array using Two Pointers:
while left < right:
  swap(arr[left], arr[right])
  left++, right--

summary: Patterns are reusable templates for solving complex problems.
